item.description:
This is not a GWH event, but it might be good for some of us to make an appearance to keep this idea going. (Check it out on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/events/499214763467539/)

This is the first in what will hopefully be a series of events with regional scientists coming to give talks on their work.

The first event speaker is Dr. Pawan Sinha from M.I.T. He will talk about how our brains interpret what our eyes see! Also, Project Prakash, led by Dr. Sinha, combines scientific curiosity and deep human compassion in underserved regions of India by helping children cured of their blindness to re-learn how to live a regular life. Come listen to Dr. Sinha and meet him in person!
item.name: Check out Science Caf√© Woo - a science-y evening in Worcester!?!
